title: AE脚本：快速生成制作箭头动画脚本 AEscripts Easy Arrows v1.2
author: 大众脸
content: 快速生成制作箭头动画脚本 AEscripts Easy Arrows v1.2。通过脚本可以非常简单快速的在AE中制作箭头动画，用mask在固态层上画出箭头路径轨迹，然后用脚本自动生成箭头动画，脚本还可控制箭头的样式、宽度、颜色、动画等属性。Animating arrows in After Effects has never been easier! With Easy Arrows you can attach an arrow to the front and end of a stroke with the click of a button. The arrow(s) will auto-orient along your mask path and change size to match the width of your stroke. There is a default arrow included, but you can also use custom layers of your own!
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CC 2015, CC 2014, CC, CS6, CS5.5, CS5, CS4
